title: Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA)
description: As a user, I want to enable multi-factor authentication, so that my account has enhanced security.
attributes_and_rules: The system should support MFA methods such as SMS and authenticator apps.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User can enable and configure MFA.
2. MFA must be used during login.
test_cases: Given a registered user, When the user enables MFA, Then the system should prompt for MFA on the next login.

title: Implement role-based access controls (RBAC)
description: As an admin, I want to assign roles for different users, so that access is managed based on user privileges.
attributes_and_rules: Roles must be configurable at different levels.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Admin can assign roles to users.
2. Users can only access features based on their roles.
test_cases: Given an admin, When they assign a role to a user, Then the user should have access according to their role.

title: Create a responsive portal interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive portal interface, so that I have a consistent experience across all devices.
attributes_and_rules: The interface should adapt to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Interface adapts to different screen sizes.
2. Interface is user-friendly on all devices.
test_cases: Given a user, When they access the portal on different devices, Then the interface should adapt accordingly.

title: Adopt bank's branding guidelines
description: As a user, I want the portal to follow the bank's branding guidelines, so that it aligns with the bank's identity.
attributes_and_rules: The portal should use the bank's logos, colors, and fonts.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal reflects bank's branding in design.
2. Branding is consistent across the portal.
test_cases: Given a user, When they access the portal, Then the design should reflect the bank's branding.

title: Create a customizable dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a customizable dashboard, so that I can see relevant banking information.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display eligible products, accounts, and recent transactions.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays relevant information.
2. Customers can customize their dashboard.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they access their dashboard, Then it should display relevant and customizable banking information.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement digital account opening workflows
description: As a customer, I want to open new accounts digitally, so that I can do it with minimal steps.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should allow for data validation and progress indicators.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can complete forms with minimal steps.
2. Workflow provides data validation and progress indicators.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they open a new account digitally, Then the process should be simple and include validation and progress indicators.

epic_title: Draft Management and Document Upload Functionality
title: Allow saving incomplete applications
description: As a user, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can return later and complete them.
attributes_and_rules: Users should be able to save progress and return later.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can save incomplete applications.
2. Users can resume and complete saved applications.
test_cases: Given a user, When they save an incomplete application, Then they should be able to resume and complete it later.
